001package com.telos.loops.properties;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnoreProperties;
004import com.telos.loops.error.LoopsValidationException;
005import jakarta.annotation.Nonnull;
006import java.util.regex.Pattern;
007
008/**
009 * Request to create a new custom contact property in Loops.
010 *
011 * <p>
012 * Custom properties must be defined before they can be used on contacts. The
013 * property name must
014 * be in camelCase format, and the type must be one of: "string", "number",
015 * "boolean", or "date".
016 *
017 * <p>
018 * Example usage:
019 *
020 * <pre>{@code
021 * ContactPropertyCreateRequest request = new ContactPropertyCreateRequest(
022 *     "planName", // name (must be camelCase)
023 *     "string" // type (string, number, boolean, or date)
024 * );
025 * }</pre>
026 *
027 * @param name the property name in camelCase format (e.g., "planName",
028 *             "signupDate")
029 * @param type the data type: "string", "number", "boolean", or "date"
030 */
031@JsonIgnoreProperties(ignoreUnknown = false)
032public record ContactPropertyCreateRequest(@Nonnull String name, @Nonnull String type) {
033
034  private static final Pattern CAMEL_CASE_PATTERN = Pattern.compile("^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$");
035  private static final String[] VALID_TYPES = { "string", "number", "boolean", "date" };
036
037  /**
038   * Compact constructor with validation.
039   *
040   * @throws LoopsValidationException if name is not in camelCase format or type
041   *                                  is invalid
042   */
043  public ContactPropertyCreateRequest {
044    // Validate name is camelCase
045    if (name == null || name.isBlank()) {
046      throw new LoopsValidationException("name is required and cannot be blank");
047    }
048    if (!CAMEL_CASE_PATTERN.matcher(name).matches()) {
049      throw new LoopsValidationException(
050          "name must be in camelCase format (e.g., 'planName'), got: " + name);
051    }
052
053    // Validate type
054    if (type == null || type.isBlank()) {
055      throw new LoopsValidationException("type is required and cannot be blank");
056    }
057    boolean validType = false;
058    for (String validTypeValue : VALID_TYPES) {
059      if (validTypeValue.equals(type)) {
060        validType = true;
061        break;
062      }
063    }
064    if (!validType) {
065      throw new LoopsValidationException(
066          "type must be one of: string, number, boolean, date. Got: " + type);
067    }
068  }
069}
